# Camelot LC

> Camelot LC - Sirdaryo viloyatidagi ingliz tili o'quv markazi. Guliston shahri.

Camelot LC is an English language learning center located in Guliston, Sirdaryo region, Uzbekistan. We offer General English, IELTS preparation, and CEFR level courses with experienced teachers.

## Courses
- General English (beginner to advanced)
- IELTS Preparation
- CEFR Level Courses (A1-C2)

## Contact
- Website: https://camelotlc.uz
- Location: Guliston, Sirdaryo, Uzbekistan

## Motto
WISDOM - IS DOING!
